summary: REQ-11 and REQ-12 appear implemented: Bottom navigation now includes a Delivery item routing to /delivery for all users, and the Delivery Notes page content explicitly explains no pre-built APK is produced, provides Bubblewrap commands, references PWA Builder, and stresses the public HTTPS prerequisite.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added extended delivery guidance in a standalone markdown document (frontend/DELIVERY.md), in addition to the in-app Delivery Notes UI.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only requires exposing guidance and instructions in-app (REQ-11/REQ-12). Updating an external markdown doc is not explicitly requested, though it is related.
